Craft Rod: Create magic rod
Craft Wondrous Item: Create and mend miscellaneous magic items

Forge Ring: Create and mend magic rings
Maximize Spell: Maximize all chosen spell variable effects uses +3 spell slot
School Opposition (Conjuration): Cannot learn or cast Conjuration spells
School Opposition (Enchantment): Cannot learn or cast Enchantment spells

Silent Spell: Cast spell w/out speech uses +1 spell slot

Notes
Familiar: Rat "Zefheiprep"

Speak With Like Animals: Talk w/similar creatures
